column4: Blackdalek what version of ubuntu becauge 7.19 gusty uses pidgin as gaim got into legal trouble over the name
I want to install pidgin on feisty 7.04
pidgin is not included in the software list for feisty... I have to install it from source.
waht? the apt-get install? No. It just tells me the software is not found. The old gaim is the only thing in the list.
